title: rbox
description: Generate various point distributions. Default is random in cube.

number_points.title: Number of points
number_points.description: Number of random points in cube, lens, spiral, sphere or grid

unit_cube.title: Unit cube
unit_cube.description: Add a unit cube to the output (optional: 'c G2.0' sets size)

unit_diamond.title: Unit diamond
unit_diamond.description: Add a unit diamond to the output (optional: 'd G2.0' sets size)

regular_polygon.title: Regular polygon
regular_polygon.description: Generate a regular polygon (optional: 'r s Z1 G0.1' makes a cone)

simplex_points.title: Simplex points
simplex_points.description: Generate random points in simplex, may use 'r' or 'Wn'

lens_distribution.title: Lens distribution
lens_distribution.description: Lens distribution of radius n. Also 's', 'r', 'G', 'W'.

random_within.title: Random within surface
random_within.description: Random distribution within 0.1 of the cube's or sphere's surface

random_disk.title: Random disk points
random_disk.description: Random points in a 0.5 disk projected to a sphere, optional gap size (e.g., 'Z0.5 s G0.6')

homogeneous_coordinates.title: Homogeneous coordinates
homogeneous_coordinates.description: Output as homogeneous coordinates for cdd

remove_command_line.title: Remove command line
remove_command_line.description: Remove command line from the first line of output

time_seed.title: Random seed by time
time_seed.description: Use time as the random number seed (default is command line)

user_seed.title: Random seed by user
user_seed.description: Use n as the random number seed
